Find Out Why Estate Agents Streamlined AML and ID checks for Estate Agents and auctioneers Conveyancers Easy AML checks for conveyancers and property lawyers Recruitment Streamlined onboarding and compliance for contractors and new starters Accountants Trusted AML compliance for accountants and tax advisors Corporate Services Instant ID/AML checks for formation agents, registered offices and notaries Become a partner Join our partner programme and enrich your offering with our range of searches WHO USES OUR DIGITAL IDENTITY VERIFICATION SOFTWARE? Credas' IDV and AML technology is widely used across 40 different sectors. Streamlined AML and ID checks for Estate Agents and auctioneers Easy AML checks for conveyancers and property lawyers Streamlined onboarding and compliance for contractors and new starters Trusted AML compliance for accountants and tax advisors Instant ID/AML checks for formation agents, registered offices and notaries Join our partner programme and enrich your offering with our range of searches WHY CREDAS? The Latin translation of Credas is: to believe; to trust in; to give credence. Here's a few reasons why you can believe and trust in us. Trust Framework Certified Credas are certified against the UK Government Digital Identity and Attributes Trust Framework We power the property sector 60% of UK housing transactions involve Credas whether directly or through our partners. We're tried and tested Over 350,000 people per month use our services to verify their ID and financial information. We have the #1 IDV in the UK With over 250,000 5-star reviews we have the highest rated IDV app in the UK and regularly feature in the top ten UK business apps. Our outcomes are sector leading Credas delivers positive results in 97% of ID verifications thanks our combination of passive liveness, NFC and data integration. We're trusted by household names Supplier to many of the UK's most recognised brands such as Connells Group, Deloitte, NHS, EY and Indeed. If you have been asked by one of our customers to verify your identity using Credas, please download the Credas app or visit https://myconnect.credas.com and input the registration code our customer sent to you via SMS or Email in order to complete the process.
